question:
Your friend has been offered a place on a cource at the university where you studied. He/she would like your advice about finding a place to live.


Write an letter to your friend
Describe where you lived when you were a student at the university
Recommend the best way to for him/her to look for accommodation
Warn him/her of mistakes students make when choosing accomodation
text: I am delighted to hear that you have secured a position for an Ergonomics course at my university. I will be glad to help you find  accommodation.
I stayed in a shared apartment with basic necessities.In fact, I found a spacious place at a cheaper rate for me to save money for a rainy day, however it was far off from the university.

You could easily browse websites like rent me or place locator to get the best match as per your requirements. Moreover, you can avail exclusive discounts and see virtual videos to experience vicarious views of walking through the rooms on such platforms.

Lastly, based on my experience, I would highly recommend renting a place which  is in close proximity to your college because you may save on time to complete umpteen assignments given by the  professors. Also, select a flat with well-equipped appliances.
Let me know if you need any further assistance.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase however. Consider adding a comma.
